GET /api.description: Responds with a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/articles.description: Responds with an array of articles in the database, with a default limit of 10 per page. Results may be filtered by the value specified in one or more valid queries. Certain queries have default values: sort_by=created_at, order=desc, limit=10

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with an article object matching the passed value of article_id. The object will include a comment_count property to show the total number of comments on that article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with an array of comments on the article with the passed article_id, with a default limit of 10. Results may be filtered by the value specified in one or more valid queries

GET /api/topics.description: Responds with an array of all topics in the database

GET /api/users.description: Responds with an array of all users in the database

GET /api/users/:username.description: Responds with a user object if the passed username matches a username in the database

POST /api/articles.description: Responds with the article object posted by the client. If an article_img_url is not provided, it will be assigned a default value of 'image_not_provided'
